website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable round massage bolster suitable for light or occasional use.
pros: Soft vinyl cover that's easy to clean
Helps relieve knee and back pain
cons: Tends to flatten out with time

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cylindrical pillow
customer_reviews.text: I clearly should have spent more time looking into this product, but even for what it is supposed to do, it's very flimsy. I was looking for a bolster that would keep its shape under pressure. This is nothing more than a cylindrical pillow and a cheap one to boot. If that's what you're looking for, you probably won't feel as I do. In case you couldn't already tell, I hate this thing. I wanted to return it, but it would have cost over half the purchase price and been a hassle on top of that. I will likely throw it out without using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: this is not as sturdy as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: this is not at sturdy as I had hoped. It has a zipper but the part you hold to unzip is actually facing inside the bolster and the zipper itself seems fragile. I will not ever unzip it for fear of the zipper breaking/splitting. Because the inside foam is so soft, it easily gets squished under the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mr papa

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this product are so inconsistent, I wonder if people are reviewing the same bolster. One reviewer said it was too big because it was nine inches wide. It isn't. It's not too hard, it's not too soft at the beginning, but the foam probably will soften. So far, the shape recovers nicely; after use.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as support during sleep for my legs since I am a side sleeper. Pillows just flattened out and became hot. This is super comfortable and easy to shift and move around at night because of the handle. The fabric seems to stay cool too - even under piles of blankets. My back pain has significantly decreased since using this bolster so I'm getting a better night of sleep and feeling more well rested as a result. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joni Watling

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The foam is starting to collapse after 3-4 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Suzanne M. Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It won't last
customer_reviews.text: This bolster is a waste of money. I have used it in my massage practice for less than 2 months and it is already flattened and won't bounce back. It is not supportive enough and will not last. My last one from Earthlite lasted 8 years of hard use and I only needed to replace it because the cover was fraying around the handle, but the inner cushion was still awesome. Pass on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mamamagic

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to put under my knees at night while I sleep. I had ordered a similar one, in price and appearance, about 3 years ago and the covering on it was falling apart so I figured I should just replace it. A month in of nightly use and the foam inside is already compressed, so that it is no longer round.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica York

customer_reviews.title: Ok for Moderate use
customer_reviews.text: Bolster is ok for moderate use. The foam inside has broken down and deformed in under a year of daily use. It needs a more dense core to stand up to everyday sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Susane

customer_reviews.title: Well made firm leg bolster
customer_reviews.text: Great firm bolster. I am so happy with. Easy to clean. The only thing I was not expecting was the zipper that was put in backwards to keep the zipper pull from scraping anyone's body.I was thinking along the lines of Velcro closure, but it doesn't really matter
customer_reviews.author: Sharina

customer_reviews.title: A good bolster for most
customer_reviews.text: Good for using on massage tables to use under knees for patients/clients with low to moderate sway back (lordosis) of low back to make them more comfortable. Do note that this is a bit smaller diameter than what you would normally see used but only a little. Very functional. Foam starts off a bit stiff but has softened somewhat with repeat use while still maintaining it's shape and ability to provide adequate support.
customer_reviews.author: Tomias

customer_reviews.title: Squashed Knee Support
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a support under my knees in bed. Over time it has become permanently squashed, a problem that i hadn't experienced before.
customer_reviews.author: lori from va

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down over time.
customer_reviews.text: The cushioning inside looses its cushion. There is gapping between the round cushion inside and the case now. The zipper broke.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Support for Knees
customer_reviews.text: A similar bolster was used for my physical therapy. Some people might say this is too firm but for me it offers a perfect balance of stability & softness. I can push my knees into it for my exercises without it going flat. Yet it's soft enough & great support while reading or watching tv. It's made of easily wipe-able material to keep it clean & it feels like it's well made.
customer_reviews.author: HLT

customer_reviews.title: Too much give
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with physical therapy after my knee replacements. It unfortunately is way too squishy and has no stability. I went to target and got a foam roller that gives me better support and gave this one away.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is soft and comfortable, yet firm enough to hold legs up. My clients use it while laying on a massage table to have lashes done and they have all commented that they like it! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Glamour&Grace

customer_reviews.title: A very soft support, not firm at all
customer_reviews.text: Good construction but not the firmness I was looking for. From readings reviews I thought this was something I could use under my spine to stretch and open up, but it goes fairly flat and doesn’t provide support.
customer_reviews.author: R. Maynes

customer_reviews.title: Nice foam bolster
customer_reviews.text: Soft, foam bolster. Does not provide much support as is crushes down immediately if you put all your weight on it. Probably only good for propping up the limbs an the joints or lightweight areas of the body. Nice quality and feels soft on the body.
customer_reviews.author: Maryjane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. After only a few months of use, the foam deforms and doesn't hold its original shape very well. As someone who frequently gives massages, I need something more sturdy in my practice. I might recommend this if you have a limited budget, only casually/occasionally give massage, or are willing to put enough linens over top to mask the lack of shape/support.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin King

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: Love this bolster for my clients! It’s perfect for anyone who has back problems! It’s sturdy, easy to wipe clean and is long enough to use on a multitude of ppl!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Palmer

customer_reviews.title: great for under peoples knees and feet during massage
customer_reviews.text: this thing is pretty soft, but you can place under people's knees when they are laying face up for pressure relief. It will conform easily to pressure this is not the thickness of a foam roller, more like a pillow with medium/soft thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Long

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, very squishy bolster and smaller compared to Iyengar-style bolsters. The inside is collapsible foam vs. firmer cotton used in yoga classes. Still works for my purposes but not raving about it.
customer_reviews.author: Loren E. Clive

customer_reviews.title: Firm and Full
customer_reviews.text: This bolster is awesome! Are those half- moon bolsters leaving the dorsal side of your foot sore? You deserve better. You deserve better. Protect the ankles and low back of your clients! what a great product
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size ankle bolster
customer_reviews.text: We like this bolster. It wipes clean, perfect size for ankles when laying face down. Good for behind knees as well. I guess you could have a thicker one if patient has a very bad back issue- but it’s exactly the right size for us. The strap handle on the end is really nice too
customer_reviews.author: Anna Moritomo

customer_reviews.title: Bebeautiful stands behind their product sales.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bolster, however it did not support my weight. I had to return it, which was not a problem. If your looking for a quality lightweight bolster than this reasonably price boster will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: John Holloway

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and works well in a chair with high ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and works well in a chair with high arms. We need ti to relieve the weight of the arms while my mom's broken neck heals, I did not consider that her usual chair has low arms so please consider how you will use this before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Vallery M Dana

customer_reviews.title: Client comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love how much more comfortable my clients are with the extra height of the bolster. Taking that pressure off their backs is so important. Will never go back to a half bolster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly for its function. It is easy to clean and I use it during every massage I give my clients!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 bolsters - one for my mother and one for me. The bolster is firm (which I like). We traded mother's with our massage therapist for one that is less firm (which is what my mother likes.). Good quality, nice cover. It holds its shape when in use. If you like a firm bolster, you should be pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: very firm ankle support for massage table - pricey
customer_reviews.text: use this simply for ankle support on massage table - very firm, wipes down easily, definitely pricey or it would get 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: schlitz

customer_reviews.title: The foam is way too soft
customer_reviews.text: The foam is way too soft. It has really bad support Lying on it just crushes it
customer_reviews.author: Avi rudich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bolster without hemorrhageing money!
customer_reviews.text: Get this $20 bolster and forget anything that costs more. It does the job well, perfect size for all body types I have encountered in my massage practice.
customer_reviews.author: jandreas

customer_reviews.title: Works great, did come to me with a little hole puncture.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly mine came with a little puncture in it. It still serves its purpose, so I did not feel like bothering with returning it for a new one. Other then the little hole it showed up with, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chemae

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace the Earthlite bolster that my crazy mother in law threw out. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Initially it was great - comfortable and all. But less than a month of use has completely flattened it.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Peters

customer_reviews.title: they hold their form
customer_reviews.text: I think these are perfect for under the knees for massages
customer_reviews.author: Renee Franklin Golson

customer_reviews.title: Good bolster
customer_reviews.text: Good bolster. Mine is taking the daily grind well. Has not lost its shape after bigger clients. Holding up very well. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It flattened out.
customer_reviews.text: This bolster did not hold up well over time. I am ordering a new one again, but I will go with a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish this bolster had more filling. If you put any weight on it it starts to deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Eleonore

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality so far hoping the vinyl doesn't Deteriorate like my old one did
customer_reviews.author: vanessa mcmillen

customer_reviews.title: So far it's good
customer_reviews.text: This is what I expected. A firm, round 6" black bolster. It was more firm than I expected, but not uncomfortable for under knees, and it might soften with use. I have only had it for a few days of work, so I cant say how well the vinyl will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: ACowGoesMoo

customer_reviews.title: Good for massage bed
customer_reviews.text: great for massge bed but extremly too puffy /bulky and sits very very high. You will need to cut half of the foam out for it to sit comfy on the bed correctly. But worth the money. i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_buyer1

customer_reviews.title: Good bolster for 1st
customer_reviews.text: Good but it is took bulky looking on table for the aesthetics factor but slim when not on the table. Perfect for ankle and knee rest foam makes it soft
customer_reviews.author: luckdjina

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up very well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't stay firm very long. It flattened out in middle rather quickly
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Usually everything I get from Amazon is great but this was for my husband. he did not like it, to long, not comfortable, etc. Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Helen I. Overfield

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It arrived when it said it would, very fast, perfect for my Massage table, the quality is impecable! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Estrella Caban

customer_reviews.title: My clients love this bolster.
customer_reviews.text: Product has been holding up quite well. My clients like this bolster a lot better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: This is very firm! I’m hoping with time it will soften a bit. But clients seem to like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Not dense enough to be effective
customer_reviews.text: This bolster is not dense enough. Weight of clients legs (supine) or Ankles (prone) make this bolster compress to 2 inches tall. Not enough for a 6” bolster IMO
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood In Memphis

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Deformed after only a couple uses. Too soft. Seems like stuffing is separating inside. I don't use it much either.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: nice quality. I got on the table with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, nice quality. I got on the table with this bolster, and so did my husband. I can't find a single thing wrong with it that would agree with any complaints that I've read in these reviews. It's firm, has handles on both ends, it was priced nicely, and it fits into my massage table pocket. That was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: celesst nash-weninger

customer_reviews.title: LMT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bolster! A little more firm than I expected but it’s better than the alternative (flimsy). I’m sure the more I use it with my clients it will break in some more. But it’s comfortable for myself and my clients. I definitely would recommend it to buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but it's very hard and the wrong size to use to sit up in bed with.
customer_reviews.author: Lory

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke the first time I handled it. I tried to return it and was inform it was be 40 bucks to send it back. Rip off!!! Fixed the zipper but the material is cheap and doesn't support much want.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Warren

customer_reviews.title: Too squishy
customer_reviews.text: This was too squishy and didn't give the needed support under the knees. But I was able to return it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Michele

customer_reviews.title: Wipes clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s good to put under ur legs while laying in bed relieves the back
customer_reviews.author: Ann Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Works great at first.
customer_reviews.text: Initially it was great, but it tends to go flat in places, and doesn't pump back up.
customer_reviews.author: King P

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bolster. It is very firm. I use it for massage and client love it. Fits perfect under feet and knees.
customer_reviews.author: Heather pappan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and it arrived very quiclky. Just perfectly matches my table and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lycaena N.

customer_reviews.title: has a perfect size almost for all people
customer_reviews.text: The full round bolster, has a perfect size almost for all people, very useful because it facilitates the work and for the patient is very comfortable. Good material to maintain clean.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyi

customer_reviews.title: Its BIG
customer_reviews.text: This is a really big size bolster. If most of your clients are small people it might be a challenge but for bigger people its perfect. Lets just see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It is very good made well quality with a good price
customer_reviews.text: My package got lost and the seller replace my item back to me so quick. It is very good made well quality with a good price. Thanks you so much...
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! It actually served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! It actually served its purpose.. firm and was able to hold up client knees and legs. I like how its easy for me to clean by just wiping it down with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised and pleased.
customer_reviews.text: It is just professional level materials. Very surprised and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bolster is great. Very firm. I use it sometimes behind my back when I'm working at computer.
customer_reviews.author: Typing4aLiving

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap feeling for twenty dollars. Flattened after daily use for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I'd like something firmer that can keep its shape better
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, after use it starts losing shape early on. I'd like something firmer that can keep its shape better, this one crushes down and doesn't give much support.
customer_reviews.author: Lashesbyjojo

customer_reviews.title: good for posture support in sitting or sidelying
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have time to sew one for a family member, so I ordered this and had it shipped to her and she loves it!! Helps her back posture when sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Wyogirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real PaperWorks been fantastic on everything I really love it great to have can't do without it
customer_reviews.author: Janice Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold its shape. It flattens out under my knees within just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This item is a bit too stiff for what I was looking for. The pillow is not comfortable to lay on for neck relief. However when sitting up in bed it is comfortable under my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown. Seems durable Use it fior exercise and u see my knees
customer_reviews.author: Peter A

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great bolster, especially for the price. Firm so it keeps its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Siggy0327

customer_reviews.title: Was good at first but after a few months has lost ...
customer_reviews.text: Was good at first but after a few months has lost all its firmness, flattens out during a massage session.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome at keeping my foot bunions from rubbing on the mattress while I sleep
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stiff and seems like cheap foam
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stiff and seems like cheap foam. Cut off the circulation of a client. Hoping it softens with use.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Firmness is just right.
customer_reviews.text: This bolster works great just the right firmness. Not hard like a foam roller, or squishy like a pillow. The grab handles across the ends are easier to get a hold of then then the tag type tabs on some other bolsters.
customer_reviews.author: Kandra Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Water proof cover, foam is firm. I use it under my knees when sleeping d/t a back problem
customer_reviews.author: monica sinkule

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit cheaply made but to be expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BlueOx

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who has been looking for it.However, it was not what he liked and it was hard and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantstic product!! repeate buyer!!
customer_reviews.text: its comfort na gd quality used for work and massage clients love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rupa Schodowski

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new bolster for my massage table. Very supportive! Great price! Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda H.

customer_reviews.title: I use this for therapeutic yoga and use it between ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for therapeutic yoga and use it between my knees while I sleep to reduce knee pain. It is much more supportive than pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ann Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all it's not good very hard and stiff.I will not recommend this bolster
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: but great
customer_reviews.text: it is a little higher than what I am used to , but great product
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great bolster. I bought this one as an alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bolster. I bought this one as an alternative bolster to the half round one I already own.
customer_reviews.author: James O

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Perfect size and support for most of my clients.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clients love it. Easy to carry, just put it inside my carrying case with my table.
customer_reviews.author: M Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this bolster
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bolster for several months now. So far, so good! My only wish is that it was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is just like what is used by our massage therapist and that is exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ted R. Poli

customer_reviews.title: No returns
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like this and they do not accept returns
customer_reviews.author: Treasa

customer_reviews.title: If I need to purchase another bolster, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color durability and how quick it came.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not firm enough!
customer_reviews.text: Foam inside too soft and does not hold shape overnight. If you’re looking to relieve lower back pressure while sleeping, this product will disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: M.G.W.

customer_reviews.title: ... bolster of 20 years with this new one and love it. It is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my old bolster of 20 years with this new one and love it. It is comfortable, yet firm, supporting the feet while prone on the massage table.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use for under knee support during exercise. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Seemed lite, until took our of box and squeezed it and well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's purpose for home use. I wouldn't use it in a practice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Great Bolster
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my table, it came with a half bolster. After I bought this one, evryone loves it. It also seems slightly bigger than ones used at a spa or massage place. It great.
customer_reviews.author: C Blakley

customer_reviews.title: It’s not just good, it’s long-term “great”’
customer_reviews.text: I love this bolster, its wonderful. I’m a Massage Therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and compliments the massage
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and firmness of the bloster. perfect match for my bed
customer_reviews.author: cassandra lewis-moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were good value for the money, and were delivered on time as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Halliday

product_meta.title: ForPro Full Round Bolster, Black, Oil and Stain-Resistant, for Massage and Yoga, 6” R x 26” L
product_meta.description: ForPro Full Round Bolster is made from high-density foam and vinyl. It is designed to relieve strain from lower back during massage therapy and add comfort during yoga and stretching. It conforms to the body’s natural curves and provides support for the vertebrae and back. The bolster can be placed under the knees during face up massages, under the ankles when face down, and can also be used to support the neck. • Features handle for ease of use • Color: Black • 6” R x 26” L • Weight: 1 lb. ForPro Professional Collection features the highest quality, best value, and largest selection for professionals and consumers. All products include 100% unconditional guarantee.
feature_bullets: Vinyl Bolster: Made from high-density foam and vinyl
Round Bolster: Bolster pillow conforms to body’s natural curves and provides support for vertebrae and back
Stain-Resistant Bolster: Vinyl bolster is oil and stain-resistant. Features handle for ease of use
